Citation¶

If you are using IphreeqcPy for academic work please cite the this manual and IphreeqcPy repository in your publications. Below is the bibtex format for citing IphreeqcPy

@manual{Patel2016,
title  = "IphreeqcPy a python wrapper for IPhreeqc",
author = "Ravi Patel",
url    = "",
year   = "2016 (accessed Sept 20, 2016)"
}
